Name: Harvard-Oxford Subcortical Probabilistic Atlas
Description: The Harvard-Oxford Atlas 2.0 project is developing a state-of-the-art, high-resolution full brain MR atlas consisting of 200 high definition MR data sets from the Human Connectome Project (HCP) parcellated into 392 gray and white matter PUs using structural MRI and 189 white matter fascicles using diffusion MRI. Manual parcellation will be performed based on a developed neuroanatomical ontology using a principled and well-defined parcellation methodology.
